name: Record Wootric responses in Google Sheets
description: Every time when you get a new response at Wootric, Make will automatically add information about responses to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e6x_GAr3g1oIolbofTG0g-WXDOiC2WrVfSHTiAdGZD4/edit?usp=sharing).
